definition: before the end of the year/before the new year
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
five hundred years ago we were the same family (idiom) (said of persons with the same surname)
pinyin: wu3 bai3 nian2 qian2 shi4 yi1 jia1

sentences.english: The ice cap is 40% thinner than 40 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 冰川厚度比40年前薄了四成。

sentences.english: Will Online Anonymity Have Gone the Way of the Dodo by2020?
sentences.chinese: 2020年前，匿名上网这种形式是否会消失？

sentences.english: Ma won a debate competition for Asian college students 22 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 早在22年前，他就赢得“亚洲大专辩论会”的奖杯。

sentences.english: One of his colleagues was murdered 11 years ago by Guangdong gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他的一个同事11年前被广东的歹徒谋杀。

sentences.english: Your opinion of T-Mac is about 4 years past due .
sentences.chinese: 你关于麦迪的观点是还停留在4年前。

sentences.english: He has always had problems putting into words the grandeur of that moment 40 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他一直不太接受40年前的那一刻是庄严壮举的说法。

sentences.english: I’ll never forget a class meeting I shared with my students some 6 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我永不会忘记6年前的那次学生班会。

sentences.english: Remember the water-conserving toilets that many states started requiring about 30 years ago?
sentences.chinese: 记得许多州对提出要求是在30年前吗？

sentences.english: Except for the weapons and Japanese trucks, it could be 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 除了武器与日本卡车，它就跟600年前没什么两样。

sentences.english: Bilateral trade reached US$59.66 billion in 2008 and approached US$43 billion in the first nine months of 2009.
sentences.chinese: 2009年前9个月，双边贸易额近430亿美元。

sentences.english: The causeway, finished just 10 years ago, has won engineering awards.
sentences.chinese: 铜锣湾在10年前竣工，获得了工程奖。

sentences.english: Hello, my name is Wonki and I came from Korea 7 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 你好，我的名字叫元基，7年前我从韩国来到这里。

sentences.english: A decade ago, my credit cards were my emergency fund.
The Kuan Im Temple(Guan Yin.Miao) in Macau was first build over 600 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 位于澳门的观音庙始建于600年前。
这看起来像是5年前的事了。

sentences.english: The first five months of 2008, the second-hand car totally maintained large increase of business volume.
sentences.chinese: 2008年前五个月，二手车累计交易量大幅增长。

definition: within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
start of month/early in the month
Wannian county in Shangrao 上饒|上饶, Jiangxi
this past year/over the last years
